action.des: Pitcher Change: Zach Miner replaces Armando Galarraga.

atbat.des: Dustin Pedroia singles on a fly ball to right fielder Magglio Ordonez.

action.des: With J. D. Drew batting, Dustin Pedroia steals (9) 2nd base.

atbat.des: Kevin Youkilis doubles (14) on a line drive to left fielder Clete Thomas. Dustin Pedroia scores. J. Drew to 3rd.
Jason Bay singles on a line drive to pitcher Zach Miner.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Nate Robertson replaces Zach Miner.

atbat.des: David Ortiz doubles (14) on a line drive to center fielder Curtis Granderson. J. Drew scores. Kevin Youkilis scores. Jason Bay to 3rd.

pitch.cc: Nate Robertson showed faith in Gerald Laird by throwing that slider in the dirt with a runner on 3rd.

atbat.des: Jason Varitek doubles (11) on a fly ball to center fielder Curtis Granderson. Jason Bay scores. David Ortiz scores.
Jacoby Ellsbury singles on a ground ball to left fielder Clete Thomas. Jason Varitek to 3rd.
Nick Green grounds into a force out, third baseman Brandon Inge to second baseman Placido Polanco. Jason Varitek scores. Jacoby Ellsbury out at 2nd. Nick Green to 1st.
Dustin Pedroia grounds into a force out, shortstop Adam Everett to second baseman Placido Polanco. Nick Green out at 2nd.

action.des: Defensive Substitution: Mark Kotsay replaces right fielder J. Drew, batting 2nd, playing right field.

atbat.des: Brandon Inge doubles (7) on a ground ball to left fielder Jason Bay.

pitch.cc: Josh Beckett has thrown 95 pitches but has plenty left in the tank, with his fastball sitting at 92 over the past 10 pitches.

action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Ramon Santiago replaces Brandon Inge.

atbat.des: Adam Everett pops out to catcher Jason Varitek in foul territory.
Clete Thomas reaches on force attempt, throwing error by second baseman Dustin Pedroia. Ramon Santiago scores. Gerald Laird to 2nd.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Daniel Bard replaces Josh Beckett.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Josh Anderson replaces Magglio Ordonez.

atbat.des: Josh Anderson reaches on fielding error by shortstop Nick Green. Gerald Laird to 3rd. Clete Thomas to 2nd.

action.des: Defensive switch from right field to first base for Mark Kotsay.
Defensive Substitution: Rocco Baldelli replaces first baseman Kevin Youkilis, batting 3rd, playing right field.

atbat.des: Miguel Cabrera reaches on fielding error by third baseman Mike Lowell. Gerald Laird scores. Clete Thomas to 3rd. Josh Anderson to 2nd.
Curtis Granderson triples (2) on a line drive to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury. Clete Thomas scores. Josh Anderson scores. Miguel Cabrera scores.
Jeff Larish grounds out, second baseman Dustin Pedroia to first baseman Mark Kotsay.
